name: Bill Kristol
summary: Influential conservative commentator and founder of The Weekly Standard who became a leading 'Never Trump' Republican, calling Trump 'unfit' and endorsing Joe Biden.

keyStatements.quote: Trump is unfit to be president. He's shown that over and over again.
I'm for Biden. Trump has been lawless, corrupt, and incompetent. We need to defeat him decisively.
Conservatives have to choose: Trump or the Constitution. You can't have both.

credibility.background: Influential conservative intellectual, founded The Weekly Standard, former chief of staff to VP Dan Quayle
positions: Founder and Editor, The Weekly Standard (1995-2018)
Chief of Staff to Vice President Dan Quayle (1989-1993)

oppositionReasons: Trump is unfit to be president
Trump is lawless, corrupt, and incompetent
Can't support both Trump and the Constitution
Trump has damaged the Republican Party
endorsement: Endorsed Joe Biden in 2020 and Kamala Harris in 2024
